title: Mag-Safe Charger Wireless Charging Station: 3 in 1 10000mAh Portable Power Bank Compatible for iPhone 16/15/14/13/12 Series and Apple Watch - Magnetic Charging Stand Black 10000mAh Black
description: 3 in 1 Wireless Charging Station: Designed specifically for Apple aficionado with an Apple Watch, iPhone, or AirPods, this mag safe charger is capable of charging multiple devices at once

[{"id":"R13RM19BGVD6P1","title":"Absolute Winner üèÜ ü•á","body":"I don't often leave reviews but this was an exception. I was concerned the price point would result in a compromise on quality, but despite the plastic casing, this charger is amazing. To give you perspective Pitaka used to make a 3-in1 Mag EZ Charger for triple the price but within a few years, discontinued it. That reason is because their batteries would overheat and expand; if not explode. They did not have the safety chips they claimed to have and despite premium materials, internal components were cheap. For this product, you have the ingenious design to build the watch charger into the removable power bank. The magnet on said watch charger isn't as strong as an Apple Charger so if you're using a metal band, the watch may move around a bit but it's not going to slide off. The ear bud charging tray holds cases of all sizes without issue. The charging speeds are tru to advertised. All that for $50. As Bob Barker would say, \"The price is right!\". I don't often leave reviews but this was an exception. I was concerned the price point would result in a compromise on quality, but despite the plastic casing, this charger is amazing. To give you perspective Pitaka used to make a 3-in1 Mag EZ Charger for triple the price but within a few years, discontinued it. That reason is because their batteries would overheat and expand; if not explode. They did not have the safety chips they claimed to have and despite premium materials, internal components were cheap. For this product, you have the ingenious design to build the watch charger into the removable power bank. The magnet on said watch charger isn't as strong as an Apple Charger so if you're using a metal band, the watch may move around a bit but it's not going to slide off. The ear bud charging tray holds cases of all sizes without issue. The charging speeds are tru to advertised. All that for $50. As Bob Barker would say, "The price is right!".
Read more

I’ve been using the Mag-Safe 3-in-1 Wireless Charging Station for a couple of weeks now, and it has quickly become one of my favorite tech accessories. It’s not just a power bank—it’s a full charging station that’s super convenient for daily use and travel.
The magnetic alignment is strong and secure—no slipping or repositioning needed.
✅ 3-in-1 Design: Charges my iPhone, Apple Watch, and AirPods all at once. The foldable stand for the watch is a brilliant touch—very sturdy and space-saving.
Great for on-the-go charging.
Doesn’t get too warm while charging, which is a plus.
Love that I can use it as a magnetic stand while charging my phone—great for watching videos or video calls.
All-in-one charging solution with reliable wireless charging and a large battery backup, this charger is a fantastic choice. Highly recommended.

I absolutely love this 3-in-1 Mag-Safe wireless charging station! It’s incredibly convenient to have a single, portable charger that powers my iPhone 14, Apple Watch, and AirPods all at once. The 10,000mAh battery is impressive — it easily gets me through a full day (or two) on the go.

The magnetic alignment is strong and secure, and it snaps right into place with my iPhone. I especially appreciate the foldable stand, which lets me use my phone in landscape mode while charging. It's perfect for watching videos or FaceTime. The build is sleek and solid, and the matte black finish gives it a premium look.

(The RORRY for Magsafe Charger Stand, [5000mAh Detachable Power Bank] failed after a couple of years; it would no longer hold a charge. The RORRY Portable Charger, 3-in-1 Charging Station 10000mAh inexplicably doesn't work if it's plugged in‚Ä¶I thought it was a lemon until I carefully read the comments.) So far, this one (which looks *exactly like* the RORRY for Magsafe Charger Stand, [5000mAh Detachable Power Bank] mentioned above‚Äîthat failed after a couple of years) works as advertised. It's incredibly handy to have my iPhone sitting at a viewable angle on my desk, all the while charging. And If I need an away-from-desk charging solution, I have the removable power bank to take with me . I have my fingers crossed that this one will continue to work for many years. I've bought a couple of similar devices, and all of them have had flaws. (The RORRY for Magsafe Charger Stand, [5000mAh Detachable Power Bank] failed after a couple of years; it would no longer hold a charge. The RORRY Portable Charger, 3-in-1 Charging Station 10000mAh inexplicably doesn't work if it's plugged in…I thought it was a lemon until I carefully read the comments.)

So far, this one (which looks *exactly like* the RORRY for Magsafe Charger Stand, [5000mAh Detachable Power Bank] mentioned above—that failed after a couple of years) works as advertised. It's incredibly handy to have my iPhone sitting at a viewable angle on my desk, all the while charging. And If I need an away-from-desk charging solution, I have the removable power bank to take with me . I have my fingers crossed that this one will continue to work for many years.
Read more

While the 16e is not magsafe capable, the case was and it connects securely. The watch charger provides constant charging feed that unlike my previous, does not and keep making a ding sound stating it is charging. The back charger for earbud case also didn't have an issue for my non apple wireless case. I don't know if its a me problem but when I have the power bank out, phone attached and vertical with the kick stand; it tips over. I set the charger horizontal and with the kick stand and it is stable. I did get an adhesive magnetic ring for phones that did not have magsafe, its a strong magnet, but in combination with the case, it was weaker hold than without, and also did not allow wireless charging on my truck. It is good if i didn't have a magsafe case. Read more","asin":"B0CYT1DJ5X","body_html":"
Great charging station for my Iphone 16e. While the 16e is not magsafe capable, the case was and it connects securely. The watch charger provides constant charging feed that unlike my previous, does not and keep making a ding sound stating it is charging. The back charger for earbud case also didn't have an issue for my non apple wireless case.

I don't know if its a me problem but when I have the power bank out, phone attached and vertical with the kick stand; it tips over. I set the charger horizontal and with the kick stand and it is stable.

I did get an adhesive magnetic ring for phones that did not have magsafe, its a strong magnet, but in combination with the case, it was weaker hold than without, and also did not allow wireless charging on my truck. It is good if i didn't have a magsafe case.

(1) they sent me a replacement and it's only been a week, but it works fine so far, (2) the replacement had a card to contact them, that I obviously threw away the first time, but should have kept, (3) after getting the replacement I read the instruction fully and realized that to make the portable charge work you need to press the button first, I've never seen any that work this way before so I didn't realize it, but one of the two problems I mentioned below was because of that button so the original unit really only had the one problem with the watch charging Seemed like a good deal, but has several problems. Wireless phone charging works fine when the battery is on the charger, but when I try to use it as a portable charger the wireless no longer works - it only works with a usb cable. It worked when I first got it and tested it, but about 2 months later it no longer worked. Also, I got an Apple Watch soon after buying this and the charging for the watch is intermittent so it keeps chiming to let me know that it is starting to charge again - very annoying. For a phone charger without the wireless MagSafe function and poor watch charging, it‚Äôs not such a great deal after all Read more","asin":"B0CYT1DJ5X","body_html":"
Updating my review for several reasons ... (1) they sent me a replacement and it's only been a week, but it works fine so far, (2) the replacement had a card to contact them, that I obviously threw away the first time, but should have kept, (3) after getting the replacement I read the instruction fully and realized that to make the portable charge work you need to press the button first, I've never seen any that work this way before so I didn't realize it, but one of the two problems I mentioned below was because of that button so the original unit really only had the one problem with the watch charging

Seemed like a good deal, but has several problems. Wireless phone charging works fine when the battery is on the charger, but when I try to use it as a portable charger the wireless no longer works - it only works with a usb cable. It worked when I first got it and tested it, but about 2 months later it no longer worked. Also, I got an Apple Watch soon after buying this and the charging for the watch is intermittent so it keeps chiming to let me know that it is starting to charge again - very annoying. For a phone charger without the wireless MagSafe function and poor watch charging, it’s not such a great deal after all
